title: Feature flag release strategy
summary: Control rollout, risk, and rollback by gating new integration capabilities with flags.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Integration changes can cause large blast radius; flags reduce impact while learning.
whenToUse: You need safe rollouts across regions/business lines
whenNotToUse: You cannot tolerate any behavior divergence in production

gotchas: Flags left on forever create complexity
thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Time-box flags and require cleanup in the definition of done.

complexity.rationale: Implementation is straightforward; discipline is the challenge.
complexity.operationalDemand: Moderateâ€”rollout and rollback must be practiced.

realWorldExample.approach: Rolled out new handlers to one region at a time using flags.
realWorldExample.outcome: Reduced incidents and improved learning speed.
